text: Mba tugen vhɨra, mbiga phunini wani tɨgɨp parawa mbɨgɨv kɨrim, Fhe Bakɨme the ndigirga, the mbara kɨrga.” 17.35-36 Bigi kaŋgi gumgi mbari khaŋ ndɨkndɨga mbui, harigi buna mueŋ phorga kha vezar ki. Mba kameŋ khaŋ muuŋgi, “Guma phunini wani tɨgɨp mɨnan kɨrga. Fhe Bakɨme the ndigirga, ana the tharga.” Ndu Matiu 24.40 ganɨri.
